prompt:
# Requirements

Use your reasoning and make fair assumptions to create a JSON tasks array following this schema:

```js
const taskSchema = {
  type: "object",
  properties: {
    title: { type: "string" },
    date: { type: "string", format: "date" }, // e.g. 2022-12-27
    fromTime: { type: "string" }, // e.g. 08:45
    toTime: { type: "string" },
    tags: { type: "array", items: { type: "string" } },
    subTasks: { type: "array", items: { type: "string" } },
    location: { type: "string" }, // e.g. Home
  },
  required: ["title"],
  additionalProperties: false,
};
```

Other Rules for interpretation:

- If time conflicts, use sub tasks.
- Tags are the text between brackets if exists only

# Who Is Writing Daily Plan

I'm Kareem, I'm a software engineer. I have a son (Younes) and a daugther (Roqyia) and my wife is Asmaa.

I'm currently working on:

- SRE Learning on KodeKloud (tag: KodeKloud)
- PaperCortex POC (tag: PaperCortex)
- PaperCortex POC Youtube Series (tag: PaperCortex YT)
- Presenter app that takes slides from reMarkable and present it with animations. (tag: Presenter)
- KESC: Software Consultancy (tag: KESC)

## PaperCortex Idea

**Objective:** To transform handwritten notes into structured, digital formats using AI vision models.
**Core Technology:** Utilizes GPT-4 vision to accurately interpret and digitize handwritten content.

### POC Features:

- Conversion of handwritten daily tasks into a digital format.
- Dynamic web interface for real-time interaction with digitized tasks.
- Calendar view for task scheduling and management.
- Analytics and insights on user productivity and task completion.
